game_description: Save the slippers that are hanging in the maze of nightmares! As you watch the maze, He opened the way for them and knocked down a scary daemon. It can help slippers get out of nightmares! Keep that in mind! Slippers sometimes get lost and sometimes stubborn as they learn how to walk. But you'll be able to save all the slippers. A new concept of shooting puzzle game. It is a shooting puzzle game that makes a way for AI characters wandering in a maze to move easily and safely. 100 stages with various solutions. Various maze shapes, slippers, objects, and daemons are combined, so each stage can be played differently each time.
